last_available_month_detection: last compliant month as per current compliance logic
multi_year_scenarios: disable quick presets for past years
ytd_behavior: show Jan-Jul data only (up to last compliant month)
mtd_definition: partial current month based on days column in calculations
visual_feedback: all options - display prominently, calendar icon, tooltips
future_month_selection: months with no data or non-compliant will not be shown - all operations are file upload based
